thread.title: John Palmer

author: John Palmer
title: John Palmer
text: I would like to say I have been thinking of transferring my credit card bill from another card to a credit card that could help me save money and help me pay off my card faster. Your recommendations for getting a Discover Card with 0 percent interest for 21 months looked good to me. So I applied for it and got it. Without you I am not sure if I would have found this information and my options for other cards. It was easy and super helpful. I am very thankful for your help with this and it is going to save me a lot of money. I would highly recommend NextAdvisor to everyone. Thank You Again! JPalmer
